**Distributions**: these graphs display the shape of a variable's values (good for assessing [normalcy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Normal_distribution), [skewness](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skewness), [kurtosis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kurtosis), etc.)
